entity.name: Norse - Frigg
entity.subtitle: Queen ofAsgard, Goddess of Marriage and Motherhood
entity.description: Wife of Odin and queen of the Aesir, Frigg is goddess of marriage, motherhood, domestic life, and foresight. She knows all fates but speaks no prophecies. From her hall Fensalir, she spins the clouds and watches over families and households. The only goddess permitted to sit on Odin's throne Hlidskjalf, she shares his all-seeing vision across the Nine Realms.

relationships.allies: Her handmaidens (Fulla, Gna, Eir), the Asynjur (goddesses), mothers and married women who invoke her
relationships.enemies: Loki(after he killedBaldr), the giantess who refused to weep forBaldr(likelyLokiin disguise), those who break marriage oaths or harm families

family.parents: Fj√∂rgynn (father, obscure giant or deity), mother unknown
family.children: Thor, Vidar, Vali, andOdin's many sons byothermothers

archetype.name: üë∏ QUEEN OF HEAVEN
archetype.description: Frigg embodies the Queen of Heaven archetype - the divine consort who rules alongside the sky father, governing marriage, motherhood, and domestic order.
